alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Lackawanna; Susquehanna; Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 4:48PM EDT until September 07 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Susquehanna County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Northwestern Lackawanna County in northeastern Pennsylvania... East central Bradford County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Northern Wyoming County in northeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 448 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Rush, or 9 miles southwest of Montrose, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rush, Jackson, Clifford, Susquehanna, Tunkhannock, Susquehanna Depot, Springville, Montrose, Dimock, and Harford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
